allow: Bash(do echo '=== Searching for $wo_id ===' find ~/02luka -name *$wo_id* -type f)
Bash("Gemini API Integration - Phase 1: Foundation Setup" )

Bash("Create core infrastructure for Gemini API integration: gemini_connector.py (API client), gemini_bridge components (task handler, memory loader), gemini_agent PERSONA_PROMPT.md. Install gemini-cli if needed. Test API connectivity with GEMINI_API_KEY." )

Bash("Files to create: g/connectors/gemini_connector.py, agents/gemini_agent/PERSONA_PROMPT.md, bridge/handlers/gemini_handler.py, bridge/memory/gemini_memory_loader.py. Dependencies: Gemini API subscription active, API key obtained. Timeline: 2-3 days. Conservative approach - additive only, no workflow replacement.")
Bash("Gemini API Integration - Phase 2: Routing Logic" )

Bash("Extend Liam and GG contract to route heavy compute tasks to Gemini. Add ''gemini'' as route_to option in gg_decision blocks. Define routing rules: complexity=complex + impact_zone=apps|tools → consider Gemini for bulk ops, testing, script generation." )

Bash("Files to modify: agents/liam/PERSONA_PROMPT.md (add Gemini routing), docs/GG_ORCHESTRATOR_CONTRACT.md (expand agent_action examples), g/docs/CONTEXT_ENGINEERING_PROTOCOL_v3.md (add Layer 4.5 Gemini). Dependencies: Phase 1 complete. Timeline: 1-2 days.")
Bash("Gemini API Integration - Phase 3: Work Order Integration" )

Bash("Integrate Gemini into work order system. Create /bridge/inbox/GEMINI/ and /bridge/outbox/GEMINI/ directories. Update Kim bot to route work orders to Gemini. Add Gemini task templates for bulk operations, test generation, code analysis." )

Bash("Files to create: bridge/inbox/GEMINI/.gitkeep, bridge/outbox/GEMINI/.gitkeep, bridge/templates/gemini_task_template.yaml. Files to modify: agents/kim_bot/kim_router.py (add Gemini routing), tools/wo_dispatcher.zsh (handle GEMINI prefix). Dependencies: Phase 2 complete. Timeline: 2 days.")
Bash("Gemini API Integration - Phase 4: Quota Tracking" )

Bash("Implement multi-engine token tracking system. Create quota_tracker.py to monitor GPT, Gemini, Codex, Claude API usage. Add quota alerts when approaching subscription limits. Dashboard widget showing token distribution across engines." )

Bash("Files to create: g/tools/quota_tracker.py, g/schemas/quota_metrics.json, g/apps/dashboard/widgets/quota_widget.html. Files to modify: g/apps/dashboard/data/metrics.json (add quota data source). Dependencies: Phase 3 complete, Gemini API billing data accessible. Timeline: 2-3 days. Quota-based budget approach.")
Bash("Gemini API Integration - Phase 5: Documentation & Deployment" )

Bash("Complete documentation for Gemini integration. Create user manual, update CLAUDE_CONTEXT.md with Gemini capabilities, add MLS integration for Gemini-produced lessons. Test end-to-end flow: GG → Liam → Gemini → Result. Verify conservative additive approach preserves existing workflows." )

Bash("Files to create: g/manuals/GEMINI_INTEGRATION.md, g/reports/gemini/deployment_report.md. Files to modify: g/CLAUDE_CONTEXT.md (add Gemini layer), agents/andy/PERSONA_PROMPT.md (reference Gemini for heavy tasks), agents/cls/README.md (Gemini review protocol). Dependencies: Phases 1-4 complete. Timeline: 2 days. Final testing and rollout.")
Bash("Conservative Additive Integration for Multi-Engine AI Systems" )

Bash("Pattern for integrating new AI engines (Gemini, GPT, Claude) without disrupting existing workflows. Key principles: (1) Additive only - no replacement of working systems, (2) Quota-based budgeting respects subscription limits, (3) Clear routing rules in orchestrator (Liam/GG), (4) Versatile use cases preserve token optimization, (5) Work order system maintains audit trail, (6) Multi-engine quota tracking prevents overuse." )

Bash("Context: Applied to Gemini API integration in 02luka system. Use cases: heavy compute offloading, bulk operations, test generation, script creation. Preserves CLC/Codex tokens for local dev work. Success criteria: Token distribution across engines, no workflow disruption, quota compliance. Reference: Gemini Integration Phases 1-5 in MLS.")
